contentrichtext.text: '''''Academic Challenge''''' is the name of several television game shows: * [[Academic Challenge (national)|''Academic Challenge'' (national)]], an American university-level competition * [[Academic Challenge (Ohio)|''Academic Challenge'' (Ohio)]], a high school program throughout Ohio * ''[[YSU Academic Challenge]]'', a high school and middle school quiz show. It has a rather different game structure than the Ohio Academic Challenge and is for schools in Mahoning and Trumbull counties and the surrounding areas. Similar are: * [[National Tournament of Academic Excellence]], a non-televised national high school competition * [[Commissioner's Academic Challenge]], a Florida high school competition == See also == * [[Academic Games]] {{disambig}}
